product_name: Osprey Quick Connect Hydration Hose Kit
long_description: The Osprey Quick Connect Hydration Hose Kit installs onto your hydration reservoir hose to allow quick and easy disconnection from the reservoir for cleaning. Bonus connection piece and hose connect to water filters. Compatible with other Osprey hydration reservoirs with 0.25 in. hoses (sold separately).
short_description: The Osprey Quick Connect Hydration Hose Kit installs onto your hydration reservoir hose to allow quick and easy disconnection from the reservoir for cleaning.
